Field.Label: To use the Rachio Plugin, you need to enter your API token, which is found in the Rachio web app (https://app.rach.io/).

Number of minutes to wait between polling Rachio for the status of your controller. 3 minutes is the minimum, but you may need to make it larger if you have multiple controllers to avoid Rachio rate limits.
Number of seconds to wait for the API to reply before continuing. You probably don't need to adjust this unless instructed by support.
